LanguageData.OG_Sororitas_Tech_Base_T1.label: Adeptus Sororitas
LanguageData.OG_Sororitas_Tech_Base_T1.description: Grants you access to basic STC templates used by the Adeptus Sororitas
LanguageData.OG_Sororitas_Tech_Base_T2.label: Adeptus Sororitas
LanguageData.OG_Sororitas_Tech_Base_T2.description: Grants you access to advanced STC templates used by the Adeptus Sororitas
